subject: RE: [junit] Is there a setUp/tearDown per TestCase?
msgSnippet: You can use junit.extensions.TestSetup class for that purpose.  Check it out. MT ... From: Vestal, Rick [mailto:rvestal@vignette.com] Sent: Tuesday, December
messageBody:
You can use junit.extensions.TestSetup class for that purpose. Check it
out.

MT

-----Original Message-----
From: Vestal, Rick [mailto:rvestal@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 18, 2001 7:42 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] Is there a setUp/tearDown per TestCase?

Hi,

Is there a set of methods similar to setUp and tearDown that are called once
for all the test methods in a testCase.

i.e. if a class has 2 test methods in it, I want:

setup-method
test1
test2
teardown-method

instead of:

setUp
test1
tearDown
setUp
test2
tearDown

Thanks,

-- Rick
